title: 이달의소녀탐구 #504 (LOONA TV #504)
summary:
0:01 -- HaSuel explains the puddle splashing scene and Go Won is looking forward to it. - HaSeul: "The friction from the cold water will wake us up and it will all be over soon."
0:26 -- HeeJIn really liked the part where they sat down in the water. "It has got to be the perfect shot". Kim Lip agrees with her sentiments.
0:47 -- Chuu really liked JinSoul's 'Singing in The Rain'. JinSoul asks her to do the steps.
0:57 -- Chuu is joined by JinSoul, HaSeul, Go Won, and YeoJin and they do the dance step.
